mapper.select:
SELECT BOARD_NUM , TITLE , WRITER , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE , READ_CNT FROM BOARD
WHERE UPPER(${searchKeyword}) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC
SELECT BOARD_NUM , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , CREATE_DATE , READ_CNT , IS_PRIVATE , BOARD_PW , ATTACHED_NAME FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
